6namespace bdsp::filter
7{
8 // a0 * x + a1 * x * z^-1 + a2 * x * z^-2
9 // H(z) = --------------------------------------
10 // 1 + b1 * y * z^-1 + b2 * y * z^-2
11 enum Coefficient
12 {
13 A0,
14 A1,
15 A2,
16 B1,
17 B2,
18 NUM_COEFFS,
19 };
20
21 // State register naming only directly reflected in DIRECT form biquad!
22 enum StateRegister
23 {
24 X_Z1, // x[n-1]
25 X_Z2, // x[n-2]
26 Y_Z1, // y[n-1]
27 Y_Z2, // y[n-2]
28 NUM_STATE_REGISTERS,
29 };
30
31 enum class BiquadStructure
32 {
33 DIRECT,
34 CANONICAL,
35 TRANSPOSED_DIRECT,
36 TRANSPOSED_CANONICAL,
37 };
38
39 class Biquad
40 {
41 public:

53
